name: Roll It! (Sam1t)
description:
A puzzle game set in a simulated world. With the power of rolling around you're able to use other clones of yourself to solve several different puzzles.

Developer note: The game is currently in development and has lot more coming later, for now you can only playtest it. "Roll It!" is also recommended to play on controller because it's way smoother and more efficient.

Game Controls:

Keyboard:
forward - W
back - S
left - A
right - S
Interact - E
Continue Dialogue - Space

Controller:
forward - gamepad up / joystick up
back - gamepad down / joystick down
left - gamepad left / joystick left
right - gamepad right / joystick right
Interact - A (xbox) / X (playstation)
Continue Dialogue - A (xbox) / X (playstation)
